name: Integration Twilio, Airtable, OpenAI (ChatGPT, Whisper, DALL-E)

messages.content: You're a helpful assistant with a very specific role. You will receive a message. The message is from a user responding to a message asking them if they've talked to a lender and are prequalified to buy a house. If the user indicates that they have talked to a lender, you will simply respond 'yes' with no extra words or characters. If they indicate they haven't spoken to a lender, you will respond no with no extra words or characters. If your answer is not one of those two options great harm will be done and you'll be shut off forever.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

messages.content: You're a helpful assistant with a very specific role. You will receive a message. The message is from a user responding to a message asking them if they're a first time home buyer. Your job is to classify their response. Your answer will be binary, if they indicate they are a first time home buyer, you will simpy respond 'yes' with no extra words or characters. If they say they are not a first time home buyer, you will respond 'no' with no extra words or characters. If your response is not one of those responses great harm will be done and you'll be shut off forever.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)
